import { Button, Card, Form, FormLayout, Layout, Page, SettingToggle, Stack, TextField, TextStyle, DataTable, Heading, Badge } from '@shopify/polaris'; import fsbStyles from './styles/free-shipping-bar.module.css'; class FreeShippingBar extends React.Component { state = { bars: [ { id: 1, name: 'My first shipping bar 1' }, { id: 2, name: 'My first shipping bar 2' }, ], templates: [ { id: 1, name: 'My first shipping template 1', img: 'template1.png' }, { id: 2, name: 'My first shipping template 2', img: 'template1.png' }, { id: 3, name: 'My first shipping template 2', img: 'template1.png' }, { id: 4, name: 'My first shipping template 2', img: 'template1.png' }, { id: 5, name: 'My first shipping template 2', img: 'template1.png' }, { id: 6, name: 'My first shipping template 2', img: 'template1.png' }, ], name: 'My first free shipping bar', goal: '100', }; renderDashboardTableData() { return this.state.bars.map((bar, index) => { const { id, name } = bar return ( Active {name} ) }) } render() { const { name, goal } = this.state; return ( Free Shipping Bar (FSB) Dashboard
{this.renderDashboardTableData()}

); } handleSubmit = () => { this.setState({ name: this.state.name, goal: this.state.goal }); console.log('submission', this.state); }; handleChange = (field) => { return (value) => this.setState({[field]: value}); }; } export default FreeShippingBar;
